required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Phase 4 Study Investigating the Efficacy of Retaine™ in Managing Signs and Symptoms Associated With Dry Eye Syndrome
clinical_study.official_title: A Single-Center Evaluation of Retaine™ Ophthalmic Emulsion in the Management of Tear Film Stability and Ocular Surface Staining in Patients Diagnosed With Dry Eye

oversight_info.authority: United States: Food and Drug Administration

brief_summary.textblock: This study will evaluate the efficacy of Retaine™ ophthalmic emulsion in treating the signs and symptoms of dry eye syndrome.

clinical_study.study_design: Endpoint Classification: Efficacy Study, Intervention Model: Single Group Assignment, Masking: Open Label, Primary Purpose: Treatment

primary_outcome.measure: Ocular surface damage as measured by fluorescein staining

clinical_study.keyword: Dry Eye, Dry Eye Syndrome, Retaine, KCS, Keratoconjunctivitis sicca
